column2: Choose one, if all are taken take 1d6 damage instead: You gain a constant fear of public speaking and refuse to talk to more than a few people at once;  You find it hard to find any amount of inspiration at all leading to a dour attitude;  Your skin begins to sparkle in light, leading to a nearly angelic appearance;
You lose this spell until the next time you rest for at least 8 hours and gain a Corruption.
You touch one target and they receive +1 to one type of roll that you specify at casting on their next action.
You touch one target and they receive +1 to their next two actions.
You touch up to two targets and they receive +1 to their next two actions.
You can target up to four targets that you either touch or can hear you and they receive +1 to their next two actions.
You can target up to six targets that you either touch or can hear you and they receive +2 to all rolls on their next two actions.
Any number of targets that you touch or can hear you receive +2 to all rolls for the next 1d4 rounds.
